name: Guinea Jump - Jumping game with guinea pigs
name_original: Guinea Jump - Jumping game with guinea pigs
description:
Help Steve 🐹, the guinea pig protagonist, to jump through the hoops and collect bell peppers 🌶 to donate them to the shelter 🏠 and adopt new guinea pigs to play with 💚.

How to play?
1⃣ Pressing on the icon ▶ you start the game.
2⃣ By selecting the icon 🏠 you can visit the shelter, donate the peppers you collect and adopt new guinea pigs.

Controls:

Jump: Arrow Up or Click or Touch.

Credits: 

Francys (Awacato) - Pixel Art.

Francisco (Gammafp) - Programming and develop of game.

Phaser (Photostorm) - Game engine.
